titles.title: I Was Glad When They Said Unto Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I was glad when they said unto me,
Let's go up to the house of the Lord.
I was glad when they said unto me,
Let's go up to the house of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My feet shall stand within Thy gates,
Within Thy gates, O Jerusalem.
My feet shall stand within Thy gates,
Within Thy gates, O Jerusalem.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Me alegre cuando me dijeron,
Vamos todos a la casa de Jehova (2x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mis pies entraran dentro de tus puertas,
Dentro de tus puertas, O Jerusalen (2x)
